vision: AI asistent nove generace pro ceske lekare - providing evidence-based clinical answers with Czech language support and local regulatory integration

target_audience.primary: Czech medical professionals (doctors, physicians) working in clinical settings who need quick evidence-based answers to clinical questions
secondary: Medical students seeking reliable clinical reference
Healthcare IT integrators connecting EHR systems

phases.name: Foundation - Revenue & Core Completion
phases.description: Complete MVP core features, enable revenue generation, and address critical technical debt. Focus on finishing VZP/SUKL integrations and establishing payment infrastructure.

milestones.title: Guidelines RAG Complete
milestones.description: Users can search and retrieve information from Czech medical guidelines with proper citations

milestones.title: Revenue Enabled
milestones.description: Payment system integrated, subscription tiers active - users can upgrade to Professional/Premium

milestones.title: Production Ready
milestones.description: Security hardened, testing in place, GDPR compliant - application ready for production deployment

phases.name: Core Clinical Features
phases.description: Implement high-value clinical features that directly address user pain points and differentiate from competitors. Focus on VZP completion, drug safety, SUKL alerts, and premium AI features.

milestones.title: VZP & SUKL Integration Complete
milestones.description: Full insurance verification and drug alerts active - core Czech regulatory advantage realized

milestones.title: DeepConsult Premium Live
milestones.description: Premium AI consultation feature available for Professional tier subscribers

milestones.title: Enhanced Drug Safety
milestones.description: Drug interaction warnings, AI summaries, and comparison tools for safer prescribing

phases.name: Enhanced UX & Clinical Workflow
phases.description: Improve clinical workflow with voice input, patient context, EHR integration, and mobile access. Make the system faster and more intuitive for daily use.

milestones.title: Voice-Powered Queries
milestones.description: Doctors can speak queries directly without typing, reducing friction during consultations

milestones.title: EHR Integration Available
milestones.description: Czech EHR systems (ICZ, CGM, Medisoft) can integrate with Czech MedAI

milestones.title: Patient Context & Safety
milestones.description: Patient profiles with personalized recommendations and prescription safety alerts

milestones.title: Mobile-First Access
milestones.description: PWA mobile app available, doctors can use Czech MedAI on rounds without desktop

phases.name: Scale & Enterprise
phases.description: Expand platform for team collaboration, build CME tracking, analytics, and integrations for broader adoption. Prepare for market expansion and MDR certification.

milestones.title: Enterprise Ready
milestones.description: Team accounts, CME tracking, and analytics available for hospital deployments

milestones.title: Platform Expansion
milestones.description: Public API and integrations enable broader adoption and third-party integration

milestones.title: MDR & Regional Expansion
milestones.description: MDR certification pathway and Slovak market preparation

features.title: Complete Guidelines RAG PDF Import
features.description: Implement the full PDF import pipeline for Czech medical guidelines, including document parsing, chunking, embedding generation, and storage in the vector database. Enable reliable retrieval of guideline content for AI responses.
features.rationale: Czech doctors need access to local clinical guidelines - this is a critical gap that general AI tools (ChatGPT, Claude) cannot address. Evidence-based recommendations require proper guideline citations. Addresses competitor pain points about lack of citations (pain-4-1, pain-4-2).
acceptance_criteria: PDF documents can be uploaded via admin endpoint
Documents are parsed, chunked, and embedded in vector database
Chunks maintain source metadata (document name, page number)
At least 3 different guideline formats are supported
Import progress and errors are properly logged
user_stories: As an admin, I want to upload Czech medical guideline PDFs so that doctors can search this content
As a doctor, I want to see which guideline a recommendation comes from so that I can verify the source

features.title: Guidelines Semantic Search Endpoint
features.description: Complete the guidelines search endpoint with proper vector similarity search. Separate guideline retrieval from general knowledge retrieval to provide more relevant, focused results from Czech medical guidelines.
features.rationale: The current implementation falls back to general retrieval (TODO noted in code). Doctors need targeted guideline search to quickly find relevant clinical recommendations. Differentiates from ChatGPT which cannot cite medical guidelines.
acceptance_criteria: Dedicated /guidelines/search endpoint is implemented
Vector similarity search queries the guidelines table specifically
Results include relevance scores and source citations
Response time is under 2 seconds for guideline queries
Search supports natural language Czech queries
user_stories: As a doctor, I want to search Czech clinical guidelines in natural language so that I can quickly find relevant recommendations
As a specialist, I want to filter guidelines by medical specialty so that I see only relevant content

features.title: Payment & Subscription System
features.description: Integrate a complete payment system (Stripe) to enable subscription-based revenue. Support three tiers: Zakladni (Free), Professional, and Premium. Include subscription management, billing portal, invoice generation, and upgrade/downgrade flows.
features.rationale: Revenue is essential for sustainable development. Discovery shows tiered pricing is planned. Competitors like UpToDate charge $500+/year - Czech MedAI can offer competitive pricing as a differentiator (pain-1-1, pain-2-2, pain-3-4, gap-3). Critical enabler for all premium features.
acceptance_criteria: Stripe integration handles recurring subscription payments
Three subscription tiers implemented with feature gating
Users can upgrade/downgrade tiers from settings
Billing portal allows users to manage payment methods
Invoices generated automatically for each billing cycle
Grace period for failed payments before feature restriction
Czech Koruna (CZK) and Euro (EUR) payment support
user_stories: As a doctor, I want to upgrade to Professional tier to access DeepConsult features so that I can get more detailed clinical analysis
As a hospital administrator, I want to manage team subscriptions so that I can provide access to my medical staff

features.title: Production CORS Configuration
features.description: Replace the wildcard CORS configuration with proper origin restrictions for production deployment. Implement environment-based CORS settings to maintain security while supporting development workflows.
features.rationale: Current configuration allows all origins (security risk noted as TODO in code). Production deployment requires proper access controls to prevent unauthorized API access. Healthcare applications require strict security standards.
acceptance_criteria: CORS origins are configured via environment variables
Production environment restricts to specific frontend domains
Development environment allows localhost origins
Preflight requests are properly handled
CORS configuration is documented
user_stories: As a developer, I want environment-specific CORS settings so that the API is secure in production while easy to develop locally

features.title: End-to-End Testing Suite
features.description: Implement comprehensive E2E testing covering critical user flows: authentication, chat queries, drug search, and VZP verification. Ensure the application works correctly from a user perspective.
features.rationale: E2E testing is noted as incomplete. Medical applications require high reliability - automated testing prevents regressions and ensures consistent user experience. Required for MDR certification pathway.
acceptance_criteria: E2E tests cover authentication flow (login, logout, session)
E2E tests cover AI chat with response verification
E2E tests cover drug search with SUKL data
E2E tests cover VZP verification flow
Tests run in CI pipeline on every PR
Test coverage report is generated
user_stories: As a developer, I want automated E2E tests so that I can confidently deploy changes without breaking critical features

features.title: Frontend Testing Framework
features.description: Implement comprehensive frontend testing: unit tests with Vitest, component tests with React Testing Library. Establish testing patterns and achieve 70%+ coverage on critical paths.
features.rationale: Discovery identified 'No frontend testing framework configured' as technical debt. Testing is essential for reliable healthcare software where bugs can impact clinical decisions. Required for MDR certification path.
acceptance_criteria: Vitest configured for unit and component tests
React Testing Library setup for component testing
Critical user flows covered: login, chat, VZP lookup, epicrisis generation
CI pipeline runs tests on every PR
Code coverage reporting integrated
Minimum 70% coverage on core components
user_stories: As a developer, I want automated tests so that I can refactor confidently without breaking functionality
As the product owner, I want test coverage on critical flows so that releases are reliable for clinical users

features.title: History Interface Click Handler
features.description: Complete the history interface by implementing proper click handling to load previous chat sessions. Replace the console.log placeholder with functional navigation and session restoration.
features.rationale: Current implementation has placeholder click handling (noted in code). Users expect to click on history items to resume previous conversations - this is table-stakes UX.
acceptance_criteria: Clicking a history item loads the full conversation
Previous messages are displayed correctly
User can continue the conversation from history
Active session is visually indicated
Loading state is shown while fetching history
user_stories: As a doctor, I want to click on a previous conversation so that I can continue where I left off
As a user, I want to review my past queries so that I can reference previous answers

features.title: GDPR Compliance & Security Hardening
features.description: Create comprehensive GDPR compliance documentation including data processing policies, user consent mechanisms, data retention policies, and privacy notice. Implement security hardening: rate limiting, request validation, encryption verification.
features.rationale: GDPR compliance is a key differentiator vs US-hosted competitors (ChatGPT, Claude, Google). Czech doctors need assurance that patient data is handled properly to use the tool in clinical settings. Addresses pain-4-3, pain-5-4, gap-6.
acceptance_criteria: Privacy policy is accessible to all users
Data processing agreement template is available
Cookie consent mechanism is implemented
User can request data export (GDPR right to portability)
User can request data deletion (GDPR right to erasure)
EU hosting is documented and verifiable
Rate limiting active on all API endpoints
All user data encrypted at rest and in transit
user_stories: As a hospital administrator, I want to review GDPR compliance documentation so that I can approve the tool for clinical use
As a user, I want assurance that patient data discussed in queries is handled securely

features.title: Complete VZP API Integration
features.description: Fully integrate with VZP (Vseobecna zdravotni pojistovna) insurance API to enable real-time drug coverage verification. Currently the VZP Navigator exists but API integration is incomplete. Allow doctors to instantly verify if a medication is covered during consultations.
features.rationale: This is the #1 differentiator against UpToDate, DynaMed, ChatGPT, and all competitors. No other clinical decision tool offers Czech insurance verification. Addresses daily workflow friction (pain-1-3, pain-2-4, pain-4-4, pain-5-3, gap-2).
acceptance_criteria: VZP API returns real-time coverage status for any drug by SUKL code
Coverage details include: reimbursement percentage, patient copay amount, prescription limitations
Response time under 2 seconds for coverage lookup
Graceful degradation if VZP API is unavailable (cached data fallback)
Integration with AI chat - coverage info appears when medications are discussed
Alternative covered drugs are suggested when original is not covered
user_stories: As a doctor, I want to verify VZP insurance coverage for a medication during patient consultation so that I can inform the patient about costs immediately
As a physician, I want VZP coverage information integrated into AI responses about medications so that I don't need to switch between systems

features.title: SUKL Drug Alerts System
features.description: Implement a real-time alerting system for SUKL (State Institute for Drug Control) regulatory changes, drug recalls, safety warnings, and supply shortages. Alerts should be proactive - notifying users of changes relevant to their practice.
features.rationale: SUKL monitoring is a critical gap in current state. Doctors struggle to track regulatory changes manually. No competitor offers Czech-specific regulatory alerts. Addresses the pain point: 'Complex process of tracking SUKL regulatory changes and drug alerts'.
acceptance_criteria: SUKL regulatory feed is monitored for changes daily
Users receive in-app notifications for drug alerts in their specialty areas
Alert types include: recalls, safety warnings, supply shortages, new contraindications
Alerts can be filtered by specialty/drug categories
Alert history is searchable
Email digest option for important alerts (weekly)
user_stories: As a doctor, I want to receive alerts when SUKL issues a safety warning for medications I commonly prescribe so that I can adjust my practice immediately
As a physician, I want to see drug shortage alerts so that I can identify alternative medications proactively

features.title: DeepConsult Premium Feature
features.description: Implement DeepConsult - an advanced AI consultation mode that provides comprehensive clinical analysis with extended context, multiple literature sources, differential considerations, and structured recommendations. Key differentiator for Professional tier.
features.rationale: Discovery lists 'DeepConsult premium feature not implemented' as a known gap. This feature justifies Professional tier pricing and differentiates from free ChatGPT usage. Addresses pain-1-4 (information overload) by providing structured, deep analysis when needed.
acceptance_criteria: DeepConsult mode accessible from chat interface for Professional/Premium users
Extended analysis includes: clinical context, differential diagnosis considerations, guideline recommendations
Multiple PubMed sources synthesized (5-10 citations per response)
Structured output with sections: Summary, Evidence, Recommendations, Considerations
Response time under 15 seconds for comprehensive analysis
Clear upgrade prompt for free tier users
Czech language output with option for English sources
user_stories: As a specialist doctor, I want deep clinical analysis with multiple citations so that I can make complex treatment decisions with confidence
As a physician handling a difficult case, I want structured AI recommendations with evidence levels so that I can justify my clinical approach

features.title: Drug Interaction Checker
features.description: Implement drug-drug interaction checking using SUKL data and medical databases. Alert doctors to potential interactions when prescribing medications, with severity levels and clinical recommendations.
features.rationale: Drug interactions are a critical safety concern. While UpToDate offers this in English, no Czech-localized solution exists. This feature adds significant clinical value and builds trust.
acceptance_criteria: User can check interactions between 2 or more drugs
Interactions are classified by severity (severe, moderate, mild)
Clinical recommendations are provided for each interaction
Interactions are sourced with proper citations
Integration with chat - AI warns about interactions in drug discussions
Support for both brand names and generic names
user_stories: As a doctor, I want to check drug interactions before prescribing so that I can ensure patient safety
As a physician, I want to see interaction severity so that I can prioritize which interactions to address

features.title: AI-Generated Drug Summaries
features.description: Generate concise, clinically relevant summaries from SPC/PIL documents using AI. Provide quick answers about dosing, contraindications, side effects without reading full documentation.
features.rationale: Reading full SPC/PIL documents is time-consuming. AI-generated summaries provide quick access to critical drug information during consultations. Addresses information overload concern.
acceptance_criteria: Summaries are generated for key sections: dosing, contraindications, side effects, interactions
Summaries are available in Czech language
Full SPC/PIL is linked for detailed information
Summaries are cached for performance
Generation time is under 3 seconds
Accuracy is validated against source documents
user_stories: As a doctor, I want quick drug summaries so that I can get key information without reading full documentation
As a physician, I want to see dosing recommendations quickly so that I can prescribe correctly during consultations

features.title: Drug Comparison Tool
features.description: Enable side-by-side comparison of multiple drugs on key attributes: efficacy, pricing, insurance coverage, side effects, contraindications. Help doctors choose between alternatives.
features.rationale: Comparing drugs on SUKL website requires multiple separate searches. An intelligent comparison tool saves time and helps with prescribing decisions.
acceptance_criteria: User can select 2-5 drugs for comparison
Comparison shows pricing, VZP coverage, active ingredients
Side effects are compared with frequency indicators
Contraindications differences are highlighted
Export comparison as PDF is available
AI provides recommendation based on comparison
user_stories: As a doctor, I want to compare similar drugs so that I can choose the best option for my patient
As a physician, I want to see price and insurance differences so that I can help patients afford their medication

features.title: Guidelines Database Population
features.description: Build out the Guidelines section with Czech clinical guidelines, protocols, and best practices. Include Czech translations of key international guidelines (ESC, ERS, EASL) and original Czech guidelines from medical societies.
features.rationale: Discovery shows Guidelines section exists but is placeholder. Evidence-based guidelines are core to clinical decision support value. Addresses the evidence gap that differentiates from ChatGPT (pain-4-1, pain-4-2, gap-5).
acceptance_criteria: Minimum 50 key guidelines available at launch
Guidelines cover major specialties: cardiology, internal medicine, surgery, pediatrics
Search functionality across all guidelines
Guidelines linked from AI chat responses when relevant
Version tracking for guideline updates
Source attribution and publication date visible
Czech language versions where available
user_stories: As a cardiologist, I want quick access to ESC guidelines in Czech so that I can reference current recommendations during consultations
As a physician, I want AI responses to link to relevant guidelines so that I can verify recommendations against official protocols

features.title: Voice Query Interface
features.description: Integrate voice transcription into the main chat interface, allowing doctors to speak queries directly. Leverage existing Whisper API transcription endpoint with a streamlined UX for hands-free operation.
features.rationale: Typing during patient consultations is disruptive. Voice input enables natural conversation flow. Transcription API already exists - this feature integrates it into the main workflow.
acceptance_criteria: Microphone button is available in chat interface
Real-time transcription is shown while speaking
Czech language speech is accurately recognized (95%+ for medical terms)
User can edit transcription before sending
Voice activation works on mobile browsers
Response time for transcription is under 2 seconds
user_stories: As a doctor, I want to speak my questions so that I can keep my hands free during patient examination
As a physician, I want voice input so that I can use the system while walking between patients

features.title: Czech EHR Integration API
features.description: Develop an integration API for Czech EHR systems (ICZ, CGM, Medisoft). Enable bi-directional data flow: pulling patient context into Czech MedAI queries and pushing AI-generated content (epicrisis, recommendations) back to EHR.
features.rationale: EHR integration is the biggest enterprise differentiator. No competitor offers Czech EHR integration (pain-1-5, gap-4). This addresses disconnected clinical workflows and unlocks hospital/enterprise sales. Critical for Premium tier value proposition.
acceptance_criteria: API documentation available for EHR vendors
Authentication via OAuth 2.0 / FHIR standards where applicable
Read API: pull patient demographics, diagnosis history, current medications
Write API: push epicrisis documents back to EHR
Sandbox environment for vendor testing
At least one pilot integration (ICZ or CGM)
Audit logging for all EHR data access
GDPR data processing agreements in place
user_stories: As a hospital doctor, I want Czech MedAI to access patient context from our EHR so that AI responses are personalized to my patient's history
As a physician writing an epicrisis, I want to send the AI-generated document directly to the EHR so that I don't need to copy-paste between systems

features.title: Patient Context Management
features.description: Implement persistent patient context that can be attached to chat sessions. Store relevant patient information (allergies, current medications, conditions) to provide personalized recommendations.
features.rationale: No competitor maintains patient context across sessions. Personalized recommendations based on patient history are more clinically relevant and safer.
acceptance_criteria: User can create and manage patient profiles
Profiles include allergies, current medications, conditions
Patient context is sent with queries for personalized responses
AI considers patient factors in recommendations
Data is stored securely with proper encryption
GDPR data export/deletion includes patient data
user_stories: As a doctor, I want to save patient allergies so that the AI considers them when suggesting medications
As a physician, I want to attach patient context to my queries so that recommendations are personalized

features.title: Prescription Safety Alerts
features.description: Implement intelligent alerts when prescriptions conflict with patient context. Warn about allergies, contraindications based on patient conditions, and potential duplicate therapies.
features.rationale: Patient context becomes valuable when paired with safety alerts. This feature combines patient data with drug information to prevent prescribing errors.
acceptance_criteria: System alerts on drug-allergy conflicts
System alerts on drug-condition contraindications
Duplicate therapy warnings are shown
Alerts are severity-classified
User can acknowledge and override alerts with documentation
Alert history is logged for compliance
user_stories: As a doctor, I want to be warned about allergy conflicts so that I don't prescribe dangerous medications
As a physician, I want alerts about contraindications so that I can make safer prescribing decisions

features.title: Progressive Web App (PWA)
features.description: Convert Czech MedAI to a Progressive Web App with app-like experience on mobile devices. Enable installation to home screen, push notifications, and offline capability for cached content.
features.rationale: Discovery lists 'Offline access capability missing' as a gap. Doctors need mobile access during rounds when desktop isn't available. PWA provides app-like experience without app store friction. Competitors like UpToDate have mobile apps.
acceptance_criteria: App installable on iOS and Android home screens
Push notifications for SUKL alerts and messages
Offline access to previously viewed content (cached)
Service worker handles network failures gracefully
Responsive design optimized for mobile
Fast load time (<3s on 3G connection)
Works in all major browsers (Chrome, Safari, Firefox)
user_stories: As a doctor on hospital rounds, I want to use Czech MedAI on my phone so that I can get clinical answers at the bedside
As a physician, I want to install Czech MedAI on my phone like an app so that I can access it quickly without opening a browser

features.title: Offline Content Access
features.description: Enable offline access to essential content: downloaded guidelines, drug information, and cached query history. Allow users to pre-download content for offline use in areas with poor connectivity.
features.rationale: Discovery identifies 'Offline access capability missing' as a gap. Rural practices and some hospital areas have poor connectivity. Offline access ensures Czech MedAI is available when needed most.
acceptance_criteria: Users can mark guidelines for offline download
Drug database subset available offline
Recent query history cached locally
Sync occurs automatically when connection restored
Storage usage visible and manageable
Clear indication of online vs offline mode
user_stories: As a rural doctor, I want to download key guidelines for offline use so that I can reference them when internet is unreliable
As a physician, I want my recent queries cached so that I can review them even without internet connection

features.title: Clinical Query Templates
features.description: Create a library of pre-built query templates for common clinical scenarios. Templates provide structured prompts for drug dosing, differential diagnosis, treatment protocols, etc.
features.rationale: Doctors often ask similar types of questions. Templates reduce friction and ensure consistent, high-quality responses for common clinical queries.
acceptance_criteria: Template library with at least 20 common clinical scenarios
Templates are categorized by specialty and use case
User can customize and save personal templates
Templates include placeholder variables for patient-specific data
Quick access to templates from chat interface
user_stories: As a doctor, I want pre-built query templates so that I can quickly ask common clinical questions
As a specialist, I want templates for my specialty so that I get relevant queries without typing everything

features.title: Team Account Management
features.description: Enable team/organization accounts for hospital departments and clinics. Allow administrators to manage user seats, set permissions, view usage analytics, and handle centralized billing for their team.
features.rationale: Discovery lists 'Team account management for Premium tier' as a gap. This is essential for enterprise/hospital sales and Premium tier value proposition. Enables bulk licensing deals.
acceptance_criteria: Organization entity can be created with admin user
Admin can invite/remove team members
Role-based permissions: Admin, Member, Viewer
Centralized billing for entire organization
Usage analytics dashboard for admins
SSO integration option for enterprise
Seat management: add/remove licenses
user_stories: As a hospital administrator, I want to manage Czech MedAI licenses for my department so that I can control access and costs centrally
As an organization admin, I want to see usage analytics so that I can measure adoption and ROI

features.title: CME Credits Tracking
features.description: Implement Continuing Medical Education (CME) credit tracking. Award credits for clinical learning activities within the platform. Track progress, generate certificates, and integrate with Czech Medical Chamber requirements.
features.rationale: Discovery lists 'CME credits tracking not implemented' as a gap. UpToDate has a strong CME program (competitor strength). This adds ongoing value that drives regular usage and supports Professional tier retention.
acceptance_criteria: Users can view CME credit balance and history
Credits awarded for completing learning modules
Progress tracking for incomplete modules
Certificate generation for completed credits
Annual summary report for license renewal
Integration path with Czech Medical Chamber credit system
user_stories: As a doctor, I want to earn CME credits while using Czech MedAI so that I can fulfill continuing education requirements efficiently
As a physician, I want to download certificates for completed CME activities so that I can submit them for license renewal

features.title: Usage Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Implement comprehensive analytics for administrators showing query patterns, popular topics, response quality metrics, and usage trends. Enable data-driven improvements.
features.rationale: Understanding how doctors use the system enables continuous improvement. Analytics help identify popular queries, gaps in knowledge, and areas for enhancement.
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard shows query volume over time
Popular topics and drugs are identified
Response satisfaction metrics are tracked
User engagement metrics (DAU, MAU, retention)
Export analytics data as CSV/PDF
Admin can filter by user, date range, query type
user_stories: As a product manager, I want to see usage analytics so that I can prioritize features
As an admin, I want to understand popular queries so that I can improve the knowledge base

features.title: Public API for Integrations
features.description: Create a documented public API enabling third-party integrations with hospital information systems (HIS), electronic health records (EHR), and other medical software.
features.rationale: Hospital systems need API access for integration with existing workflows. A public API enables embedding Czech MedAI into existing clinical software. Extends reach beyond direct users.
acceptance_criteria: RESTful API with comprehensive documentation
API authentication via API keys and OAuth
Rate limiting and usage quotas
SDKs for common languages (Python, JavaScript)
Sandbox environment for testing
API versioning strategy
user_stories: As a hospital IT administrator, I want API access so that I can integrate Czech MedAI with our HIS
As a developer, I want SDK documentation so that I can build integrations quickly

features.title: MDR Certification Preparation
features.description: Prepare documentation and implement processes required for EU Medical Device Regulation (MDR) certification as a Class IIa medical software device. Includes quality management system, clinical evaluation, and technical documentation.
features.rationale: Discovery mentions 'MDR (Medical Device Regulation) readiness' as a differentiator. MDR certification builds trust with hospitals and enables positioning as a validated clinical tool. Required for enterprise healthcare market.
acceptance_criteria: Quality Management System (QMS) documented
Risk management file complete per ISO 14971
Clinical evaluation report prepared
Technical documentation per MDR Annex II
Post-market surveillance plan in place
Notified body selected and engaged
CE marking timeline established
user_stories: As a hospital CIO, I want assurance that Czech MedAI is MDR certified so that we can approve it for clinical use
As the product owner, I want MDR certification so that we can sell to risk-averse healthcare organizations

features.title: Slovak Market Expansion
features.description: Expand to the Slovak market with Slovak language support and integration with Slovak regulatory systems (NCZI, health insurers). Leverage language similarity and shared medical terminology.
features.rationale: Natural market expansion due to language similarity and shared healthcare context. Slovak market has similar gaps (no local AI clinical tool). Doubles addressable market with relatively low localization effort.
acceptance_criteria: Slovak language interface option
Slovak regulatory system integration (NCZI)
Slovak health insurance verification
Slovak drug database integration
Local marketing and sales presence
Compliance with Slovak healthcare regulations
user_stories: As a Slovak doctor, I want Czech MedAI with Slovak language support so that I have a local clinical AI tool
As the business owner, I want to expand to Slovakia so that we can grow revenue in a similar market

features.title: EHR Vendor Marketplace
features.description: Create a marketplace/partner program for Czech EHR vendors to build integrations. Provide SDKs, documentation, certification program, and revenue sharing for integrations.
features.rationale: Scalable approach to EHR integration - enable vendors to build integrations rather than building each one internally. Creates ecosystem lock-in and network effects.
acceptance_criteria: Partner program terms defined
SDK and documentation available
Certification process for integrations
Revenue sharing model for partners
Marketplace listing page
At least 3 partner integrations certified
user_stories: As an EHR vendor, I want to integrate Czech MedAI into our product so that we can offer AI capabilities to our hospital customers
As a hospital IT director, I want to see certified integrations so that I can choose a compatible EHR
